sn45.30:1.2: Atha kho ayasma uttiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma uttiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.30:1.3: “idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn45.30:1.5: Katame nu kho panca kamaguna vutta bhagavata’”ti?
sn45.30:1.7: Pancime kho, uttiya, kamaguna vutta maya.
sn45.30:1.9: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
sn45.30:1.13: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
sn45.30:1.14: ime kho, uttiya, panca kamaguna vutta maya.
sn45.30:1.15: Imesam kho, uttiya, pancannam kamagunanam pahanaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.30:1.18: Imesam kho, uttiya, pancannam kamagunanam pahanaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo”ti.
